prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Reed, Guitar, Bass, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
Organ, Reed, Guitar, and Bass are the instruments featured in this song, but Drums are absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Organ, Reed, Guitar, and Bass, but without Drums.

Style 3:
No Drums are present in this song, which instead features Organ, Reed, Guitar, and Bass.
